channel.title: Website advirtisement forums
channel.description: I have my own forums i'd like to get off the ground. a website advertisement section would help me and others do that.

item.title: Website advirtisement forums
item.dc:creator: @ada ada
item.description:
@ada wrote:

Yes, but they encourage you to make a post in “[Approved Links]”, so they can declog the general section. But guess what! It just clogs it up even more, and it never gets updated!

Read full topic

item.title: Website advirtisement forums
item.dc:creator: @Bebemycat2 Bebe
item.description:
@Bebemycat2 wrote:

You are free to advertise your forum/website as long as the website has been approved by either Moparisthebest or Starblaster100.
You can get it approved by PMing one of them with the link and asking for approval. Once that process is done, you can post your link in the general section (following to all the rules of course).

Read full topic
